entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
